member.summary: The leather interior accessory.

member.summary: The stereo system and leather interior accessories.

member.name: T:Wu.Jiahui.Business.CarWashInvoice
member.summary: This class contains functionality that supports the business process of creating an invoice for the car wash department.

member.name: P:Wu.Jiahui.Business.CarWashInvoice.PackageCost
member.summary: Gets and sets the amount charged for the chosen package.
member.exception: Thrown when the property is set to less than 0.

member.name: P:Wu.Jiahui.Business.CarWashInvoice.FragranceCost
member.summary: Gets and sets the amount charged for the chosen fragrance.
member.exception: Thrown when the property is set to less than 0.

member.name: P:Wu.Jiahui.Business.CarWashInvoice.ProvincialSalesTaxCharged
member.summary: Gets the amount of provincial sales tax charged to the customer.

member.name: P:Wu.Jiahui.Business.CarWashInvoice.GoodsAndServicesTaxCharged
member.summary: Gets the amount of goods and services tax charged to the customer (rounded to two decimal places).

member.name: P:Wu.Jiahui.Business.CarWashInvoice.SubTotal
member.summary: Gets the subtotal of the Invoice.

member.name: M:Wu.Jiahui.Business.CarWashInvoice.#ctor(System.Decimal,System.Decimal,System.Decimal,System.Decimal)
member.summary: Initializes an instance of CarWashInvoice with a provincial and goods, services tax rate, package cost and fragrance cost.
member.param: The rate of provincial tax charged to a customer.
The rate of goods and services tax charged to a customer.
The cost of the chosen package.
The cost of the chosen fragrance.
member.exception: Thrown when the provincial sales tax rate is less than 0, or when the provincial sales tax rate is greater than 1, or when the goods and services tax rate is less than 0, or when the goods and services tax rate is greater than 1, or, when the package cost is less than 0, or when the fragrance cost is less than 0.

member.name: M:Wu.Jiahui.Business.CarWashInvoice.#ctor(System.Decimal,System.Decimal)
member.summary: Initializes an instance of CarWashInvoice with a provincial and goods and services tax rates.
member.param: The rate of provincial tax charged to a customer.
The rate of goods and services tax charged to a customer.
member.exception: Thrown when the provincial sales tax rate is less than 0, or when the provincial sales tax rate is greater than 1, or when the goods and services tax rate is less than 0, or when the goods and services tax rate is greater than 1.

member.name: T:Wu.Jiahui.Business.ExteriorFinish
member.summary: Represents the exterior finish of the car.

member.name: F:Wu.Jiahui.Business.ExteriorFinish.Standard
member.summary: The standard exterior finish.

member.name: F:Wu.Jiahui.Business.ExteriorFinish.Pearlized
member.summary: The pearlized exterior finish.

member.name: F:Wu.Jiahui.Business.ExteriorFinish.Custom
member.summary: The custom exterior finish.

member.name: F:Wu.Jiahui.Business.ExteriorFinish.None
member.summary: None of the exterior finishes.

member.name: T:Wu.Jiahui.Business.Financial
member.summary: This static class contains functionality that includes financial functions.

member.name: M:Wu.Jiahui.Business.Financial.GetPayment(System.Decimal,System.Int32,System.Decimal)
member.summary: Returns the payment amount for an annuity based on periodic, fixed payments and a fixed interest rate.
member.param: The total number of payment periods in the annuity.
The present value (or lump sum) that a series of payments to be paid in the future is worth now
member.returns: The payment amount for an annuity.
member.exception: Thrown when the rate is less than 0, or when the rate is greater than 1, or when the number of payments is less than or equal to zero, or when the present value is less than or equal to zero.

member.name: T:Wu.Jiahui.Business.Invoice
member.summary: This abstract class contains functionality that supports the business process of creating an invoice.

member.name: P:Wu.Jiahui.Business.Invoice.ProvincialSalesTaxRate
member.summary: Gets and sets the provincial sales tax rate.
member.exception: Thrown when the property is set to less than 0, or when the property is set to greater than 1.

member.name: P:Wu.Jiahui.Business.Invoice.GoodsAndServicesTaxRate
member.summary: Gets and sets the goods and services tax rate.
member.exception: Thrown when the property is set to less than 0, or when the property is set to greater than 1.

member.name: P:Wu.Jiahui.Business.Invoice.ProvincialSalesTaxCharged
member.summary: Gets the amount of provincial sales tax charged to the customer (rounded to two decimal places).

member.name: P:Wu.Jiahui.Business.Invoice.GoodsAndServicesTaxCharged
member.summary: Gets the amount of goods and services tax charged to the customer (rounded to two decimal places).

member.name: P:Wu.Jiahui.Business.Invoice.SubTotal
member.summary: Gets the subtotal of the Invoice.

member.name: P:Wu.Jiahui.Business.Invoice.Total
member.summary: Gets the total of the Invoice.

member.name: M:Wu.Jiahui.Business.Invoice.#ctor(System.Decimal,System.Decimal)
member.summary: Initializes an instance of Invoice with a provincial and goods and services tax rates.
member.param: The rate of provincial tax charged to a customer.
The rate of goods and services tax charged to a customer.
member.exception: Thrown when the provincial sales tax rate is less than 0, or when the provincial sales tax rate is greater than 1, or when the goods and services tax rate is less than 0, or when the goods and services tax rate is greater than 1.

member.name: T:Wu.Jiahui.Business.SalesQuote
member.summary: Contains functionality that supports the business process of determining a quote for the sale of a vehicle.

member.name: P:Wu.Jiahui.Business.SalesQuote.VehicleSalePrice
member.summary: Gets and sets the sale price of the vehicle.
member.exception: Thrown when the property is set to less than or equal to 0.

member.name: P:Wu.Jiahui.Business.SalesQuote.TradeInAmount
member.summary: Gets and sets the trade in amount.
member.exception: Thrown when the property is set to less than 0.

member.name: P:Wu.Jiahui.Business.SalesQuote.AccessoriesChosen
member.summary: Gets and sets the accessories that were chosen.
member.exception: Thrown when the property is set to an invalid value.

member.name: P:Wu.Jiahui.Business.SalesQuote.ExteriorFinishChosen
member.summary: Gets and sets the exterior finish that was chosen.
member.exception: Thrown when the property is set to an invalid value.

member.name: P:Wu.Jiahui.Business.SalesQuote.AccessoryCost
member.summary: Gets the cost of accessories chosen.

member.name: P:Wu.Jiahui.Business.SalesQuote.FinishCost
member.summary: Gets the cost of the exterior finish chosen.

member.name: P:Wu.Jiahui.Business.SalesQuote.TotalOptions
member.summary: Gets the sum of the cost of the chosen accessories and exterior finish (rounded to two decimal places).

member.name: P:Wu.Jiahui.Business.SalesQuote.SubTotal
member.summary: Gets the sum of the vehicleâ€™s sale price and the Accessory and Finish Cost (rounded to two decimal places).

member.name: P:Wu.Jiahui.Business.SalesQuote.SalesTax
member.summary: Gets the amount of tax to charge based on the subtotal (rounded to two decimal places).

member.name: P:Wu.Jiahui.Business.SalesQuote.Total
member.summary: Gets the sum of the subtotal and taxes.

member.name: P:Wu.Jiahui.Business.SalesQuote.AmountDue
member.summary: Gets the result of subtracting the trade-in amount from the total (rounded to two decimal places).

member.name: M:Wu.Jiahui.Business.SalesQuote.#ctor(System.Decimal,System.Decimal,System.Decimal,Wu.Jiahui.Business.Accessories,Wu.Jiahui.Business.ExteriorFinish)
member.summary: Initializes an instance of SalesQuote with a vehicle price, trade-in value, sales tax rate, accessories chosen and exterior finish chosen.
member.param: The selling price of the vehicle being sold.
The amount offered to the customer for the trade in of their vehicle.
The tax rate applied to the sale of a vehicle.
The value of the chosen accessories.
The value of the chosen exterior finish.
member.exception: Thrown when the vehicle sale price is less than or equal to 0, or when the trade in amount is less than 0, or when the sales tax rate is less than 0, or when the sales tax rate is greater than 1.
Thrown when the accessories chosen is an invalid argument, or when the exterior finish chosen is an invalid argument.

member.name: M:Wu.Jiahui.Business.SalesQuote.#ctor(System.Decimal,System.Decimal,System.Decimal)
member.summary: Initializes an instance of SalesQuote with a vehicle price, trade-in amount, sales tax rate, no accessories chosen and no exterior finish chosen.
member.param: The selling price of the vehicle being sold.
The amount offered to the customer for the trade in of their vehicle.
The tax rate applied to the sale of a vehicle.
member.exception: Thrown when the vehicle sale price is less than or equal to 0, or when the trade in amount is less than 0, or when the sales tax rate is less than 0, or when the sales tax rate is greater than 1.
